snippet: Mali and Ghana advanced to the semifinals at the African Cup of Nations.
abstract: Mali and Ghana advanced to the semifinals at the African Cup of Nations.
lead_paragraph: The semifinals are set at the African Cup of Nations, where Mali edged Gabon, one of the tournament's co-hosts, in a penalty shootout after a 1-1 tie on Sunday. Barcelona's Seydou Keita converted the winning penalty.

headline.main: Ghana and Mali Advance to African Cup Semifinals
